response.overview: On a quiet night in a small street something is going to happen. Two bakers are living in war with each other. Each of them has his own goal. Who is going to make it?
response.tagline: On a quiet night in a small street something is going to happen. Two bakers are living in war with each other. Each of them has his own goal. Who is going to make it?
response.title: Eclaire
